body:
This PR modifies the behaviour of modules and dotkits:
* Sets default `autoload` option to `'direct'` for all module types
* Modifies 'tcl' module layout so that modules are installed into separate directories based on package name.
* Updates and corrects documentation

This maybe merged directly, or incorporated into #3183. It addresses some of problems discussed in #3134.
title: Enable module autoload and standard layout by default
